alert.note: Alert for Cole; Moniteau (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 03 at 3:27AM CDT until August 03 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Missouri, including the following areas, Cole MO and Moniteau MO. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain will continue through mid morning, with widespread 1-3" totals and isolated amounts of 6-8+" possible.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
